[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1005003 - Statement - Estado de flujos de efectivo, método indirecto (Statement) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalentsInSubsidiaryOrBusinessesAcquiredOrDisposed2013, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseInCashAndCashEquivalents, ifrs-full:EffectOfExchangeRateChangesOnCashAndCashEquivalents, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseInCashAndCashEquivalentsDiscontinuedOperations, ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalents All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1007004 - Statement - Estado del resultado global, componentes ORI presentados antes de impuestos (Statement) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1009005 - Statement - Estado de cambios en el patrimonio neto (Statement) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:Equity, ferr:PerpetualSubordinatedBonds, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangesInOwnershipInterestsInSubsidiariesThatDoNotResultInLossOfControl All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.

Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9626] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of -1,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.ferrovial.com/role/EstadodelresultadoglobalcomponentesORIpresentadosantesdeimpuestosStatement should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of -711,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.ferrovial.com/role/EstadodecambiosenelpatrimonionetoStatement. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -6 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -6 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/95980020140005757903/2020-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/95980020140005757903-20201231.zip/95980020140005757903-20201231/reports/95980020140005757903-20201231.xhtml 4440
